document.full_text: the homeless street preacher convicted of kidnapping elizabeth smart was sentenced on wednesday to life in prison after smart told him he would be held responsible for his actions "in this life or the next."
document.title: elizabeth smart's kidnapper gets life in prison
lines_and_colors: the homeless street preacher convicted of kidnapping elizabeth smart was sentenced on wednesday to life in prison after smart told him he would be held responsible for his actions "in this life or the next."
